title: Ep. 62 - There Is Nothing Uplifting Or Empowering About Stupid, Trashy Pop Music
description:
Ariana Grande is out with a trashy and utterly stupid song and video called “God is a woman.” The media has hailed it as empowering and uplifting for women. But, like most pop music, it is neither of those things. It is exactly the opposite, in fact.
